FAIL_TO_PASS: when global option but positionalOptions then not candidate for subcommand suggestion
when enablePositionalOptions() then option parsed by subcommand
when enablePositionalOptions(false) then option parsed by program
when unknown option after command-argument then option passed through
when shared option after subcommand then parsed by subcommand
when same named option in sub and program then optsWithGlobals includes global
when shared option after subcommand argument then parsed by subcommand
when action handler and unknown option after command-argument then option passed through
when option before command-argument then option parsed
when shared option after sub argument then option read by sub
when known option after command-argument then option passed through
when help option after command-argument then option passed through
when enablePositionalOptions(true) then option parsed by subcommand
when same named option in sub and program then source is defined by global
when shared option before and after subcommand then both parsed
when version option after command-argument then option passed through
when shared option before sub and after sub and after sub parameter then all three parsed
